subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: Ericsson 4 won the first leg of the round-the-world Volvo Ocean Race, sailing into Cape Town’s harbor 12 hours ahead of its nearest rival after a gale-lashed trip from Spain.
snippet: Ericsson 4 won the first leg of the round-the-world Volvo Ocean Race, sailing into Cape Town’s harbor 12 hours ahead of its nearest rival after a gale-lashed trip from Spain.
